transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir aapne join nahi kiya?
Executive: Ha aapka number save nahi hai na
Customer: Sir par maine aapko whatsapp kiya na aapke 764 wale number pe jispe call kiya hai isse whatsapp kiya hai maine aapko kisi aur number pe whatsapp karna hai kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi wo number save nahi rehta hai na to link clickable nahi hota hai
Customer: Click nahi hota aap us pe kuch revert kariye nahi aap ya to save kar lijiye ya to kuch hi hello ka message mujhe revert karenge na to bhi link pe click ho jayega wo whatsapp ka hi guidelines hai ki shayad ye aise unknown wagera ke liye
Executive: Okay hai maine save kar liya abhi aapka number theek hai ho gaya hai wo na
Customer: Ji ji ji to aap abhi isko aap to join join now ya jo bhi aap bol aa raha hoga wo kariye
Executive: Ek second main aapko in kar rahi hu
Customer: Uh sir aapke system mein voice hai matlab microphone iska sahi chal raha hai?
Executive: Ji
Customer: To hum ek hi jagah connect karte hain sir is pe system pe theek hai?
Executive: Chalega chalega
Customer: Ek second main apna microphone on kar leti hu
Customer: Aur ye main call disconnect karti hu okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join the meeting.

- Link not clickable due to unsaved number.



Resolution:

- Executive saved the customer's number.

- Agreed to connect on the system.

- Executive disconnected the call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- joining meeting, whatsapp, link, microphone
